body_html:
import torch
x = torch.tensor([])
x.requires_grad = True
x.mean().backward() # no error triggered
x = x.cuda()
x.mean().backward()

Doesn't crash on master for me but it might be machine-dependent

body:
```
import torch
x = torch.tensor([])
x.requires_grad = True
x.mean().backward() # no error triggered
x = x.cuda()
x.mean().backward()
```
Doesn't crash on master for me but it might be machine-dependent
